org.apache.ddlutils.alteration
Interface ModelChange

All Known Subinterfaces:
ColumnChange, ForeignKeyChange, IndexChange, TableChange
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddColumnChange, AddForeignKeyChange, AddIndexChange, AddPrimaryKeyChange, AddTableChange, ColumnChangeImplBase, ColumnDefinitionChange, ColumnOrderChange, ForeignKeyChangeImplBase, IndexChangeImplBase, PrimaryKeyChange, RecreateTableChange, RemoveColumnChange, RemoveForeignKeyChange, RemoveIndexChange, RemovePrimaryKeyChange, RemoveTableChange, TableChangeImplBase
public interface ModelChange

Marker interface for changes to a database model element.

Version:
$Revision: $
